title: Did Budweiser Announce Plan To Opt Out of Super Bowl Ads in 2021?
subtitle: The beer company announced a "holistic" advertising plan for 2021.
author: Madison Dapcevich
vclaim: As the pandemic pressed on into the first month of 2021, Budweiser manufacturer Anheuser-Busch announced it would forgo Super Bowl advertising and allocate funding to COVID-19 vaccination awareness and education instead.
